mapper.select: select id, version, type, yaoqiu, start_time as startTime, finish_time as finishTime from ming_ren_tang_config where 1=1 order by id desc
select id, version, type, yaoqiu, start_time as startTime, finish_time as finishTime from ming_ren_tang_config where 1=1 and type = #{type} and start_time <= NOW() and finish_time >= NOW() limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into ming_ren_tang_config( version, type, yaoqiu, start_time, finish_time ) values( #{ver}, #{id}, #{yaoqiu}, str_to_date(#{starttime}, '%Y/%m/%d/%H:%i:%s'), str_to_date(#{finishtime}, '%Y/%m/%d/%H:%i:%s') )
